title: NAPK1NS_RA3
author: NAPK1NS_RA3
created_time: August 22, 2023, 08:45:44 AMLast edit: August 23, 2023, 12:14:15 PM by NAPK1NS_RA3

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: NAPK1NS_RA3 on August 22, 2023, 08:45:44 AMb]I knew I would reach my goal eventually, but I have a confession to make. Since this $1,000,000 win, I have given $250,000 back…currently deciding whether I want to do one last $250,000 bet to get back to $1,000,000.[/b]This an amount of money that many gamblers won't think twice leaving gambling to invest such money into different streams of income that could be yielding profits. I read a comment in the forum a member talking about his friend that only gamble when he does not have money after getting the money he never gambles again until he's lacking money. Such persons will make good use of this amount.OP what makes you believe you won't lose the remaining amount after you have already lost half an amount back to where the money came from.  If you were lucky to have won $1,000,000. it doesn't mean you will be luck to make more of it on the next bet. The way you're about to go is not how a good and experienced gambler will place bets, you will  lose the money even before placing the bet.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: NAPK1NS_RA3 on August 22, 2023, 08:45:44 AMBet Link: https://stake.com/sports/home?iid=sport%3A97821755&modal=betI knew I would reach my goal eventually, but I have a confession to make. Since this $1,000,000 win, I have given $250,000 back…currently deciding whether I want to do one last $250,000 bet to get back to $1,000,000.Where I bet: StakeTelegram: Ra3FixesTwitter: Ra3BetsIf you are a real gambler, you know what to do. We don't just stop when we make money; we like to keep making more. The amount you won is already a substantial sum for some, but you know your satisfaction level. If you aren't satisfied yet, you can continue trying. Who knows, you might be able to turn that $1 million into $10 million? Anyway, good luck and congratulations.

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: Quote from: NAPK1NS_RA3 on August 22, 2023, 08:45:44 AMBet Link: https://stake.com/sports/home?iid=sport%3A97821755&modal=betI knew I would reach my goal eventually, but I have a confession to make. Since this $1,000,000 win, I have given $250,000 back…currently deciding whether I want to do one last $250,000 bet to get back to $1,000,000.Where I bet: StakeTelegram: Ra3FixesTwitter: Ra3BetsNever say with such certainty. Gambling is a completely luck based platform where you can go broke at any moment. So never prove anything to yourself in this fortune based platform. Thanks OP you have met your target, you can stop your bets from here as you have met your target and reached the target. If you greed more then you can lose your entire money at any time. $1000000 is very surprising to hear. You put your dollars into any business activity. This will reduce your financial risk and you will be able to spend your next life very well.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Have you heard about rich people that went broke just because they continue to gamble and gambling made them Lost all and they become poor? If you have made a lot of money in gambling like this, it would be wise to invest it on something good like businesses. Just use little amount to be gambling.In the process of trying to reach higher money in gambling, the more you will want to go further, gambling can turn bad against someone at anytime.

comments.author: Maslate
comments.body: When you say 'finally,' does it mean your ultimate goal has already been achieved? If the answer is yes, I think you should stop gambling and consider taking that $1 million elsewhere, perhaps investing it to grow it in a less risky way, or enjoying some of your winnings as a reward for yourself.Sometimes, my friend, luck can make you greedy too. So, I suggest you calm down a bit and reevaluate your goals to make the right decision. Don't let your emotions drive you towards something you might regret in the future.

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: I don't think you should stop. You need to go for a new target which you already have posted and go for it. A gambler never stop until he is satisfied and I am confident that you are not. If I had said to stop and think for alternative investment option you would have laughed on my reply. It took some time to achieve your target and now aim for the next one and don't stop until you have achieved it.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: You're playing with so much money. I haven't experienced this myself so I don't know how it feels. There must be a lot of pressure. I suppose every game that you bet on is very fun and thrilling to watch. This is how I feel when I'm watching a game that I'm betting on. I'd rather not tell you to stop, but I also won't tell you to go on. I don't know how rich you are, but if you have so much money then a million dollar is something you can risk.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: NAPK1NS_RA3 on August 22, 2023, 08:45:44 AMI knew I would reach my goal eventually, but I have a confession to make. Since this $1,000,000 win, I have given $250,000 back…currently deciding whether I want to do one last $250,000 bet to get back to $1,000,000.Wow this is some decent amount, congratulations on achieving your target.I haven’t actually gambled with such amount before so I can’t really tell if putting that large amount back into your account is a good idea or a bad one, but one thing is certain; if you put the $250,000 back into your gambling account and let’s say you were lucky enough to win another $1,000,000 you certainly would want to put more and win even more and eventually lose more than you wanted to. At this stage you should be able to control your greed and also learn how to manage your finance, if you just throw money into your account because it’s present and you feel you can do whatever you like with it will surely have an effect on you in the long run.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Quote from: NAPK1NS_RA3 on August 22, 2023, 08:45:44 AMI knew I would reach my goal eventually, but I have a confession to make. Since this $1,000,000 win, I have given $250,000 back…First congratulations for reaching that milestone, not everyone is lucky to rich that amount in gambling. And if you've given back that quarter back to somewhere you think is helpful then just be it.Quote from: NAPK1NS_RA3 on August 22, 2023, 08:45:44 AMcurrently deciding whether I want to do one last $250,000 bet to get back to $1,000,000.[/b]If I were in your shoe, it is not a question anymore and I'll just take whatever it is and will be having my self-reflection if I really need to. Because my mind tells me that I should be well and done and be contented with that.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Withdraw 95% of your balance and enjoy those money, please don't give them back to the casino operator : travel, discover places, ensure your future, give yoursefl quality time with people you enjoy. Don't waste too much time in front of a PC, just gamble a few with the remaining 5% balance you leave on the site ( guessing you enjoy gambling) but relegate this pleasure into  a marginal part of your life.

comments.author: boltz
comments.body: If I were you I would ask for all the gambling sites to ban me so I could peacefully spend my money wisely and start an investment or anything similar but if you're a hard gambler , the need to actually gamble again will be big so I do hope you will find a balance and make a good decision with your money. In rest...big congrats for the win as that is huge from my perspective.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: A gambler will continue to gamble. It is normal that you want to bet one last time to get back $1,000,000. But it won't be as easy as before because the previous one wasn't easy either. You should rest for a while and enjoy your previous win before you start playing gambling again.  This is to refresh your mind and release tension because you have succeeded in getting victory after victory.Not many gamblers achieve their gambling goals, and you may be one of them. So enjoy your time celebrating your win and take a vacation for a while to help you.

comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on August 22, 2023, 11:52:25 AMI don't think you should stop. You need to go for a new target which you already have posted and go for it. A gambler never stop until he is satisfied and I am confident that you are not. If I had said to stop and think for alternative investment option you would have laughed on my reply. It took some time to achieve your target and now aim for the next one and don't stop until you have achieved it. I am not sure he will stop even though many people who suggest to him about how the flow of money is better than gambling, I think he is a rich person or at least he has the qualifications to waste that kind of money from the job that pays higher.If he feels his journey to that extent, it will be difficult for him to change overnight if he wants to stop or move the flow of money, he will laugh at him and indeed it will certainly be difficult if it runs that far in gambling, most likely he will find the latest target again to meet his satisfaction .But I want to find out where he spends his money, in sports betting or in a slot?

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: I know it would have taken you some time to achieve this but the big question now is what next, since you've been able to be accounted for the rate of losses you've made on the course of achieving this, will you still afford to continue thesame way and pattern aiming for more big catch or you will adjust a little to invest with your money and plan on other things you could remember the success with in future, but remember that it won't make sense if the money you've won eventually get back to gambling without you taking decision on what to do in taking advantage of this rare opportunity.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: This is so so amazing, and I can't help but gosh at such an amount of money being mentioned here, even only $250,000 is more than enough to set me on the path of forever wealth with no chance of ever having to taste what poverty feels or taste like..But then, it's what it is, we all have our time, and I just hope continues to make judicious use of this time so that all this never never go back to where it came from, but rather multiply even more..If I was op, I did set $900,000 aside for investment in other areas like buy more bitcoin and invest in real estate, then start a new target with $100,000, how about this @op?

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: NAPK1NS_RA3 on August 22, 2023, 08:45:44 AMI knew I would reach my goal eventually, but I have a confession to make. Since this $1,000,000 win, I have given $250,000 back…currently deciding whether I want to do one last $250,000 bet to get back to $1,000,000.Why not stay on your strategy that gives you this almost 1M win? Bet smaller value and use high odds to achieve that 250K profit with wagering less amount. You have a very good analysis skill and don’t waste your money on one time big time bet since you have high chance of winning on multiple bets due to your minimal error.Also, remove that hidden affiliate link on your OP because you can get banned by sharing affiliate link on your post. You can only put affiliate link on your signature space.Nice win.

comments.author: Negotiation
comments.body: Online gambling is experienced by players who use small bets to win big. In some cases their luck is on their side and in other cases, they know how to work the system. They understand how to take small bets and eventually win big. It is really a big win, in most cases it is difficult to get such a big win. There are many gamblers who even after winning, greed works in them to get more then they risk losing everything. Therefore, the best way is to abstain from gambling for a while. Enjoy your winning day and spend your winnings on good causes or invest like bitcoins which may increase in value.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: NAPK1NS_RA3 on August 22, 2023, 08:45:44 AMcurrently deciding whether I want to do one last $250,000 bet to get back to $1,000,000.The decision is yours, if you are the one who advised you to bet it's ridiculous, maybe you lucked out on your first bet with a $1000k win, did the second bet also have the same fate, of course that must be questioned.You should think, your first bet was successful, why in the second bet you have to ask here, you should do as you did at that time, who dares to be responsible for losing your money, of course you yourself are responsible for it all, for that gamble as you do it, no one is involved in the bet you want to make. you are free to do whatever you want to do, remember yesterday is not the same as today.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Having achieved that is definitely a crazy thing. That's a lot of money from gambling (based on my point of view) because it's really something that would make you gamble more and more if you experience a lot of that in the long term. Like right now, you think that you can make your $250k into $1M again which is not impossible but probably could give you a hard time to replicate it again. It is all risk.
